successes.title: nexpaq: the first truly modular smartphone case
successes.description: Missed our campaign? You can now pre-order your nexpaq at nexpaq.com/shop

Pledges.description: BIG THANK YOU: A huge thanks for your support and for helping us make nexpaq a reality. You will appear on our wall of fame on the website, and we’ll keep you updated with all our latest news.

SPECIAL EDITION USB MODULE: You will receive a special edition 32GB USB module with engraving. You will be able to use this module as a regular USB flash drive, even if you don’t have a nexpaq case right now. Thanks for your support!

THE BATPAQ: You will receive one batpaq. This reward level does not include modules. This is a great option for anyone who wants a batpaq in addition to a nexpaq or to choose their own modules individually (see selections on page). The batpaq has 2600mAh of rechargeable battery power.
Available Colors: Black, White, Black and Kickstarter Green, White and Magenta.
SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT KIT: This is one for the developers. You will get our SDK and information before anyone else so you can develop apps for our future nexpaq modules!

EARLY BIRD NEXPAQ & FOUR MODULES: Thank you for your early support! With this pledge you will get one nexpaq smartphone case for iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy S5 or S6 edge, and the four featured modules (see infographic for featured modules or to add individual modules)
Available color: Black or white

BETA BUNDLE FOR iPHONE 6: If you love to get your hands on tech before it’s released then this is one for you. You will receive the nexpaq beta version for iPhone 6 and four featured modules. You will also receive the new nexpaq version when it's ready! (see infographic for featured modules or to add individual modules)
Available colors: Black or White
iPHONE 6 PLUS EARLY BIRD: It's here! The iPhone 6 Plus will be delivered Q1 2016 if minimum 1000 iPhone 6+ cases are ordered.
This will come with 4 modules (Speaker, battery, hotkey, SD Card reader)
Available colors: Black, White, Black and Kickstarter Green, White and Magenta

NEXPAQ CASE & FOUR MODULES: You will receive one nexpaq smartphone case for iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy S5 or S6 edge and the four featured modules (see infographic for featured modules or to add individual modules)
Available colors: Black or White

SPECIAL EDITION MAGENTA NEXPAQ AND FOUR MODULES: Want to add a bit of color to your nexpaq? You will receive one nexpaq for iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy S5 or S6 edge in white with four magenta lined modules (see infographic for featured modules or to add individual modules)

ENGRAVED NEXPAQ IN KICKSTARTER GREEN AND FOUR MODULES: This is exclusive to our Kickstarter backers.You will get one green & black nexpaq case for iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy S5 or S6 edge and four Kickstarter green lined modules (see infographic for featured modules or to add individual modules)
BATPAQ AND FOUR MODULES: You will receive one batpaq with four  modules (see infographic for featured modules or to add individual modules). Each batpaq has 2600mAh of rechargable battery power.
Available colors: Black, White, Black and Kickstarter Green, White and Magenta
iPHONE 6 PLUS: It's here! The iPhone 6 Plus will be delivered Q1 2016 if minimum 1000 iPhone 6+ cases are ordered.
This will come with 4 modules (Speaker, battery, hotkey, SD Card reader)
Available colors: Black, White, Black and Kickstarter Green, White and Magenta
